Data: Irfan to Finch, OUT and he's gone first ball! He slanted that full and wide, and he went hard at it but the ball sliced off the face of his bat and Ahmed Shehzad takes a good catch at point, diving to his right
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length, slanted across outside off, and Smith lets it go
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length, a little closer to off stump this time, Smith leaves again
Irfan to Smith, no run fuller, wide of off stump, third leave in a row
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length on off and middle, defended towards mid-off
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, shuffles across and punches it to mid-on
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run short, wide, and Shehzad dives full length to his left at backward point and stops a certain boundary after Warner reached across and slapped hard at it
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run back of a length, angling in on an off-stump line, defended towards mid-off off the back foot
Wahab Riaz to Warner, FOUR runs short and wide again and this time Warner finds the gap in front of backward point. Strong wrists through that square cut, there
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run back of a length outside off, punched to wide mid-off

Wahab Riaz to Warner, 1 leg bye fuller now, angling down the leg side, and Warner doesn't connect with his flick, and collects a leg bye after the ball runs off his pad towards deep backward square leg
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run length ball outside off, Smith gets a decent stride in to defend towards cover
Irfan to Warner, no run length ball on middle stump. Warner stays in his crease and jams his bat down to poke it away towards midwicket
Irfan to Warner, no run looks to angle it in again, and slants down the leg side. Pings him on the pad as he misses the flick
Irfan to Warner, no run back of a length now, and he shuffles across and tucks it off his hip towards square leg
Irfan to Warner, no run full on a fifth stump line, and Warner plays a checked drive to mid-off
Irfan to Warner, no run length ball, a little closer to off stump, defended towards mid-off
Irfan to Warner, no run straightens from a good length on off stump, and the ball slides off the shoulder of Warner's bat down to backward point as he looks to defend
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run length ball on middle and off, tucked away towards midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run full, a bit of width, and he presses forward and leans into a nice looking drive, straight to mid-off
Wahab Riaz to Smith, 1 run back of a length on off stump, shuffles across and tucks it away backward of square leg
Wahab Riaz to Warner, FOUR runs short, and he's back in a flash to pull that from outside off, wide of midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run straightens a touch outside off, just back of a length, and Warner adjusts to defend towards cover point
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot to cover

Irfan to Smith, FOUR runs full, too full on a fourth-stump line, and Smith just showed a full face and drove that down the ground. Bounced over the stumps at the bowler's end and the umpire moved swiftly out of the way
Irfan to Smith, no run full and straight, blocked towards mid-on
Irfan to Smith, no run length ball on middle and leg, he's attacking the stumps here, and Smith clips it away to midwicket
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length now, angling across, teasing line, and Smith lets it go
Irfan to Smith, no run length ball, kept low outside off, and Smith got a tiny edge on it as he jammed his bat down and the ball bounced on its way through to Sarfraz

Irfan to Smith, no run overpitched ball, similar to the one Smith drove down the ground a few balls ago, but this time he goes a bit too hard at it, doesn't time it, and jams it down into the pitch, easily fielded by the bowler in his follow-through
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run full on leg stump, angling down, and Warner can't connect with the flick and is hit on the boot
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run length ball outside off, and he gets a decent stride out to punch that towards cover point
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run shortish ball, a bit of width as well, but cover point is right on the circle and he slapped that straight to the fielder
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot to short cover
Wahab Riaz to Warner, FOUR runs short, wide, and this time he stands up tall and finds the gap between short extra cover and cover point
Wahab Riaz to Warner, 2 runs full, on the pads, clipped away to deep backward square leg. Slows down quite a lot on a patchy bit of outfield
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length, slanting away from Smith, and he lets it go through to the keeper
Irfan to Smith, no run beauty! moved his length a little fuller, and Smith came forward to defend. The ball carried on with the angle, bounced a touch extra, and beat the outside edge
Irfan to Smith, no run slower ball, very full on middle stump, flicked away towards square leg
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, punched to cover
Irfan to Smith, 1 run back of a length on off stump, and Smith goes back, waits for it to come to him and dinks it into the on side with soft hands to steal the quick single
Irfan to Warner, 1 leg bye back of a length again, sliding down the leg side as Warner misses the flick and ricochets off his thigh pad towards square leg
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run big appeal for lbw as Wahab bowls it full and Warner misses another flick, but the umpire shakes his head and you can see why - it was definitely sliding down leg
Wahab Riaz to Warner, no run back of a length outside off, punched hard to short cover
Wahab Riaz to Warner, 1 run back of a length, angling in. It's flicked in the air but bounces down safely to deep backward square leg
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run back of a length on off stump, defended towards short cover
Wahab Riaz to Smith, 1 wide slips down the leg side, not too far down, but that's enough for the umpire to exercise his arms in this format
Wahab Riaz to Smith, FOUR runs full, a bit of width, and Smith leans into a lovely cover drive and finds the gap to the right of the cover fielder
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run fullish ball outside off, defended down the ground
Babar to Warner, no run back of a length, angled across, and he defends off the back foot
Babar to Warner, 1 run back of a length, a touch too straight, and he tucks it off his pads to deep square leg
Babar to Smith, no run tossed up slow outside off, defended off the front foot
Babar to Smith, 1 run down the track now, driven to deep cover

Babar to Warner, no run what a catch! The umpire's saying it's not out! Went for the sweep, and he got something on that and Fawad dived to his right at leg slip and took a quite magnificent grab, but maybe that wasn't off bat or glove. It hit his thigh pad, but was there a bit of de
Babar to Warner, no run quick and flat, and Warner goes back and pushes it back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run on the pads, clipped away to deep backward square leg
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run back of a length outside off, and he punches it to mid-off, who's stationed fairly wide
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run back of a length outside off, pushed to short cover

Anwar Ali to Warner, 2 runs uppish, but timed very nicely. It was straight, and he stayed in the crease and pushed at the ball. It popped up a touch uppishly, but went in the gap between short midwicket and mid on
Anwar Ali to Warner, FOUR runs pushes at a ball angled across him, on a fourth stump line, from halfway forward, and gets a thick outside edge that runs away to the third man boundary
Babar to Smith, FOUR runs down the pitch and throws his hands at the ball outside off, and the ball slices off the face of his bat, wide of point and runs away for four
Babar to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, punched to point
Babar to Smith, no run quickish, fullish ball outside off, defended into the covers
Babar to Smith, no run a touch slower now, outside off, and he comes forward to defend to short cover
Babar to Smith, 1 run shorter this time, and he stays next to the line of the ball and pushes it with a straight bat to the sweeper at deep cover point
Babar to Warner, 1 run shortish ball, pulled, or swept from a standing position, down to deep backward square leg
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run length ball, angled across, and he closes his bat face to work that from outside off down to deep square leg
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run length ball outside off, driven to deep cover
Anwar Ali to Warner, 2 runs short, wide, cracked hard off the back foot and Fawad has to sprint a long way to his left from deep cover point to stop that on the slide
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run back of a length on off stump, and he opens his bat face and dabs that to backward point
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run length ball, angling across towards middle and off, worked away with a closed bat face to deep backward square leg
Babar to Warner, 1 run tossed up on middle stump, and Warner poked that with soft hands towards cover point
Babar to Smith, 1 run shortish ball, a bit of width, slapped to deep cover
Babar to Warner, no run full on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Babar to Warner, no run quickish ball on the pads, tucked away to square leg
Babar to Warner, 1 run flat, quick, shortish, pulled to deep midwicket
Babar to Smith, no run fullish ball on off and middle, defended to short cover
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run back of a length, just outside off, punched to mid-off
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run length ball on off stump, tight line, defended off the back foot, back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run length ball on middle stump, clipped away. Fawad dives to his left at short midwicket to make a good stop, but can't prevent the single
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run fullish ball on off stump. Smith shuffles across and clips it away to deep square leg
Anwar Ali to Warner, FOUR runs shot! That was full and wide, slower ball as well, and he used a lot of bottom hand to swat that over mid-off
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run that bottom hand again. This time, it's back of a length, and he uses his hands and wrists to whip it away from outside off down to deep backward square leg
Babar to Warner, no run length ball on the pads, tucked away straight to square leg

Babar to Warner, no run appeal for caught behind, down the leg side. Looked to glance, and Sarfraz grabbed it against his thigh, on the second attempt. Umpire was unmoved. Yup, went off the pad, and Misbah did well not to review
Babar to Warner, 1 run swept away from a leg-stump line, down to deep backward square leg
Babar to Smith, 1 run down the pitch, nice footwork, checked drive down to long-off
Babar to Warner, 2 runs down the leg side again, and he gets a top-edge on that sweep, goes quite uppish, quite fine, and Fawad runs across from deep backward square to stop that
Babar to Warner, no run back of a length, worked away to square leg, where Shehzad dives to his right to make the stop
Anwar Ali to Smith, SIX runs down the pitch, makes a bit of room, and he launches this way over wide long-off with a full follow-through
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of a length on off stump, shuffles across and nurdles it away to deep square leg
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run back of a length outside off, poked to short cover
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run slower bouncer, and Warner was back very quickly and had to wait a long time before it came on and he could hook it away down to deep backward square leg
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run short, the regular short ball this time, and Smith swivels on it to pull it down to deep backward square leg
Anwar Ali to Warner, 2 runs shortish ball, controlled, wristy pull from off stump towards deep midwicket
Afridi to Smith, 1 run tossed up delivery outside off, driven to long off
Afridi to Warner, 1 run full around middle, worked down to long on for one
Afridi to Smith, 1 run flatter one on a length, he punches to the sweeper off the back foot
Afridi to Warner, no run flights it a bit around off stump line, he plays it out from the crease
Afridi to Warner, no run a quicker one that hurries after pitching and Warner jabs at it off the back foot, to short third man
Afridi to Warner, no run played out to midwicket
Irfan to Smith, FOUR runs he walks across before the ball is bowled, and picks this full ball from just outside off, and whips it to the deep midwicket boundary, that is some timing on this outfield
Irfan to Smith, 1 run another one pitched up, and slanted across, he drives hard but sweeper is around
Irfan to Warner, no run tries to short-arm pull this short of a length ball, but mistimes it to midwicket
Irfan to Warner, no run punches nicely this time from the crease but picks out extra cover
Irfan to Warner, 1 run short and wide, Warner sets himself up and goes hard on the cut, but hasn
Irfan to Smith, FOUR runs four more, Smith swivels and sends this short ball racing to the deep backward square rope, fine leg wasn't too far, but he had no chance
Afridi to Warner, OUT the breakthrough, Afridi does it, Warner backs away to pull, but hits it low to midwicket, who snaps it up happily

Afridi to Bailey, no run lbw appeal first ball, and that looked very close. Not given, but he was on the front foot, and that slid on with the angle, in typically Afridi fashion, and where did that make contact? Misbah's called for the review... inside edge, was there? And was it ba
Afridi to Bailey, 2 runs full outside leg, clipped away towards deep midwicket
Afridi to Bailey, 1 run shortish ball on off stump, makes some room and slaps it to deep cover
Afridi to Smith, 1 run quickish ball on middle and leg, and he goes deep in his crease to tuck that away towards deep backward square leg
Afridi to Bailey, no run another quick slider, very straight, and Bailey defends carefully off the front foot
Irfan to Smith, 1 run full on leg stump, clipped away to deep backward square leg
Irfan to Bailey, 1 run back of a length outside off, slapped away to deep cover
Irfan to Smith, no run length ball, angled across on a fourth-stump line, and Smith comes forward to defend towards mid-off
Irfan to Smith, 1 run full-toss outside off, driven to deep cover

Irfan to Bailey, 2 runs back of a length, a bit of bounce as he looks to steer it behind point, and the ball goes uppishly in the direction of where third slip would be, but who has a third slip in ODIs?
Irfan to Bailey, no run fullish ball, angled across, and Bailey lets it go outside off
Afridi to Smith, 1 run quickish down the leg side, and Irfan does brilliantly to throw himself to his right at short fine leg and stop that tickled shot
Afridi to Bailey, no run length ball outside off, defended to short cover
Afridi to Bailey, no run slides on with the angle as he comes forward to defend, goes off the inside half of his bat into the on side
Afridi to Bailey, no run quick and flat again, and he comes forward and defends towards midwicket
Afridi to Bailey, 1 run fullish ball on middle stump, clipped away to wide long-on
Afridi to Smith, 1 run full ball on leg stump, pushed to long-on with a straight bat
Irfan to Smith, 2 runs short ball, angling across Smith, who walks across and miscues that pull, a touch uppish, down towards deep midwicket
Irfan to Smith, no run length ball on a fourth-stump line, defended to mid-off
Irfan to Smith, no run slower ball, in the blockhole on off stump, jammed back to the bowler with a straight bat
Irfan to Smith, no run full outside off, driven to mid-off
Irfan to Smith, 1 run back of a length, angled across, punched away to the right of the diving fielder at point
Irfan to Bailey, no run back of a length outside off, punched to backward point
Afridi to Smith, 1 run fullish ball on leg stump, clipped away to deep backward square leg
Afridi to Bailey, no run length ball on off stump, defended towards mid-off
Afridi to Bailey, 1 run length ball on middle stump, pushes at it and the ball goes uppishly, just wide of Afridi, who dives to his right
Afridi to Smith, 1 run full on middle stump, driven down to long-on to bring up Smith's first ODI fifty
Afridi to Bailey, no run length ball, a little slower, just outside off, and he defends into the covers
Afridi to Bailey, no run quicker now, slanted towards leg stump, dinked into the on side
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven to deep cover
Fawad Alam to Bailey, 1 run short ball, pulled away to deep midwicket
Fawad Alam to Smith, 2 runs tossed up from wide of the crease, wide of off stump, driven to deep cover
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run tossed up just outside off, driven down to long-off
Fawad Alam to Bailey, 1 run length ball outside off, driven to the right of deep cover
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run flatter now, angled in towards leg stump. Smith stays back and pushes it to long-on with a straight bat
Afridi to Smith, no run tossed up wide outside off, and he stays back and slaps this to mid-off. Didn't quite come on, and he may have been looking to go squarer
Afridi to Smith, 2 runs flicks this uppishly, against the turn, and it drops just short of Misbah, diving to his right at short midwicket
Afridi to Smith, no run a bit of turn now, and he looks to turn it away with a closed face and the leading edge nearly carries back to the bowler
Afridi to Smith, 1 run back of a length on leg and middle, and he goes back and nurdles it away towards short fine leg
Afridi to Bailey, no run short and wide, and Shehzad dives to his left at backward point to stop a well-struck cut from Bailey
Afridi to Bailey, 1 run back of a length, punched down the ground, and he runs an overthrow after Afridi picks up the ball and flicks the ball towards the stumps at the bowler's end
Fawad Alam to Bailey, 1 run skips down the track and drives this to long-off
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run a very slow, round-arm ball, a la Yuvraj, and he drives towards long-off again
Fawad Alam to Bailey, no run quicker, not as full, defended towards cover point
Fawad Alam to Bailey, SIX runs and now Bailey has had enough of this old-fashioned milking. Goes down on one knee and slog-sweeps him from off stump, high over deep midwicket

Fawad Alam to Bailey, OUT goes for a repeat, and Afridi does the star-man pose after taking a blinder. That wasn't quite as full, and it turned away and he hit it way up in the air. Afridi turned back from short midwicket and ran towards the 30-yard circle and tumbled forward as the
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run flattish ball on leg stump, clipped away to the left of deep square leg
Afridi to Smith, 1 run short, wide, and this time Shehzad can't quite reach the ball as he dives to his right to stop that cut. Deep cover does the fielding behind him
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run flattish ball on off stump, Maxwell comes forward and opens his bat face to carve that away towards deep cover point
Afridi to Smith, 1 run length ball on leg stump, and he goes on the back foot to work it away towards deep backward square leg
Afridi to Maxwell, no run dropped. That turned away just a touch from a lovely length as Maxwell pushed at it in front of his body .The outside edge bounced off Sarfraz's gloves
Afridi to Maxwell, no run beaten again. This one was bowled from wider on the crease, and it straightened and was a little too quick for Maxwell
Afridi to Maxwell, no run slower, fuller, straighter, and Maxwell turns it carefully to short midwicket
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run length ball outside off, driven to long-off
Fawad Alam to Maxwell, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, whipped away down to long-on
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run tossed up again, on off stump, driven with a straight bat to long-off
Fawad Alam to Maxwell, 1 run flatter now, angled in towards off stump, and he works his wrists to beat Fawad, who sprinted to his right in his follow-through to try and cut off the single
Fawad Alam to Smith, 1 run tossed up outside off, and Maxwell didn't get to the pitch of it. The ball turns, takes his outside edge, and runs away towards the third man boundary
Fawad Alam to Maxwell, 2 runs
Afridi to Smith, 1 run shortish ball outside off, steered away to deep cover point

Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run dropped again! Maxwell looks to slog against the turn from wide outside off, and the edge loops up behind the stumps. Shehzad runs back very quickly from wide slip and gets his hands to it but the ball bounces out
Afridi to Smith, 1 run full on leg stump, clipped down to long on
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched away to deep point
Afridi to Smith, 2 runs down the pitch now, and flicked against the turn towards deep midwicket
Afridi to Smith, no run angled in from wide of the crease, turns away from a nice length on off stump, and Smith defends watchfully back to the bowler
Wahab Riaz to Maxwell, 2 runs back of a length on the pads, clipped away wide of mid-on
Wahab Riaz to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to deep cover point
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run length ball, hit on the pads as he missed the flick. Pitched outside leg
Wahab Riaz to Smith, 1 run back of a length on middle stump, shuffles across and works it to deep square leg
Wahab Riaz to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length just outside off, and he slices it down to third man
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run back of a length on middle and off. Shuffles across but can't get it past short midwicket
Babar to Maxwell, no run angled in to the pad, worked to midwicket
Babar to Maxwell, no run flighted, straightening on middle, defended
Babar to Maxwell, 1 run eases a flighted ball past extra cover to the sweeper
Babar to Smith, 1 run could have been in trouble, skipped out and chipped it over midwicket, fell short of long on running across
Babar to Maxwell, no run defended off the front foot
Babar to Maxwell, FOUR runs reverse sweep to end the over, picks up the full ball from around off and cracks it past short third
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run length ball worked off the pad to deep square leg
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, 1 wide a slower bouncer, he walks across and lets it travel down the leg side
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, 2 runs length ball on middle, whipped to deep midwicket
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, no run tries to drive but checks his shot to mid off as this is not full enough
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, 2 runs opens the face and runs this length ball to third man
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, no run slower ball pitched up on the stumps, blocked back
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, 1 run width on this length ball, cracked away to the sweeper
Afridi to Smith, OUT charges out, Afridi bowls it full and wide, Smith reaches out and slams it straight to long off
Afridi to Abbott, no run goes back to defend a length ball to the bowler
Afridi to Abbott, 1 run turned off the pad behind square leg
Afridi to Haddin, no run googly, pulled down to long on
Afridi to Haddin, 1 run full and angled in, turned to short fine leg
Afridi to Abbott, 1 run
Wahab Riaz to Abbott, no run steps out, swings and misses this length ball outside off, Riaz gives him a long stare
Wahab Riaz to Abbott, no run good length on off, squeezed out to backward point
Wahab Riaz to Abbott, 1 run very full and he opens the face to lift it over point, sweeper is around to stop it
Wahab Riaz to Haddin, 1 run has a go at this length ball, it runs through midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Abbott, OUT another one, he charges out, and wants to deposit this short of a length ball down the ground, but only hits it as far as long on
Wahab Riaz to Haddin, no run short of a length ball rises and hits him as he fails to work it away
Irfan to Johnson, no run gets a yorker in on the stumps, it is squeezed out to midwicket
Irfan to Johnson, no run took his eyes off this, it wasn't too short, but kept rising into him, and pinged the glove
Irfan to Johnson, no run was making some room but Irfan banged it in short, it came at his throat, and Johnson just got out of the way in time
Irfan to Johnson, FOUR runs short again, but leg sidish, and Johnson flays it down to the fine leg boundary
Irfan to Johnson, 1 run slower one outside off as he walks across and turns it to deep square
Irfan to Haddin, no run another slower one, he makes some room and has a crack at it, mishits to extra cover
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, no run backs away outside leg, Riaz follows him with a yorker, and he misses it
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, 3 wide a pretty high full toss now, slips just down leg
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, no run backs away to leg, but misses a length delivery just outside off stump
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, 1 run length ball on off stump, he walks across and turns it to fine leg
Wahab Riaz to Haddin, FOUR runs shot, mid off is up, this one is pitched up, and Haddin has lofted it very cleanly over the fielder
Wahab Riaz to Haddin, no run 141 kph back of a length ball, he tries to pull, but there is no room and he plays it to midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Haddin, 1 leg bye short of a length on the pad, he tries to force it fine but cannot do much with it

Babar to Maxwell, OUT this time he is gone, skips out, and lofts it, he didn't appear to be sure what to do with it, and appeared to have got a touch too close to the pitch, Irfan does not make any mistake as he slides to take it at long off
Babar to Smith, no run defended softly off the front foot
Babar to Smith, no run goes on the back foot, makes some room, and punches to point
Babar to Smith, 1 run walks out of the crease and works it to deep square leg
Babar to Faulkner, no run length ball played out to midwicket
Babar to Faulkner, no run tossed up delivery, he moves forward and runs it to backward point
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run short of a length, tapped to point
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of a length ball punched to the sweeper
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, FOUR runs poor line, down the pads, and he tickles it fine past the keeper
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, no run length ball, he moves forward and blocks
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, 1 run works it in front of square off middle, and they settle for one
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run shortish ball worked softly to the right of midwicket
Irfan to Haddin, no run a slower length ball just outside off, Haddin tries to heave it away and misses
Irfan to Haddin, no run short of a length and climbing outside off, Haddin tries to launch it over extra cover, misses again
Irfan to Haddin, 1 run short of a length, guided to point
Irfan to Johnson, 1 wide a slower one again, Johnson misses as he walks across, Irfan thought there was something there
Irfan to Johnson, no run makes room outside leg but Irfan is on target with a yorker and it is through Johnson again
Irfan to Johnson, no run a high full toss, Johnson is surprised, and only manages to stab it away, close to being a no-ball for height but not quite
Irfan to Johnson, 1 run pitched up ball flayed off an inside edge to deep square
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, FOUR runs full and Johnson has got hold of this, he's clobbered it past Riaz, who is lucky not to get hit
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, FOUR runs a full toss now, he walks across and whips it square for four more
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, FOUR runs three in a row, Johnso backs away, Riaz keeps it outside off, Johnson reaches it to guide it past covers
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, 2 runs short of a length, worked through square leg for two more
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, 1 wide bouncer outside off, climbing too much, says square leg umpire, that is an unfair call
Wahab Riaz to Johnson, OUT Riaz on target finally this over, Johnson makes room, swings and misses, and Riaz hits leg stump with a length ball
Wahab Riaz to Kane Richardson, 2 runs makes room and slices this length ball wide of the sweeper for two

So only 64 off the last ten overs, despite that expensive last over. Pakistan have not allowed Australia to get away, even as Smith made his maiden century. Superb figures for Afridi, and Irfan and Babar proved difficult to target too. Back at 7.15 pm for the chase

7.14pm The Australian players are running out, they have 255 to defend on this slow pitch. There might be some dew too. Mitchell Johnson will bowl the first over and Ahmed Shehzad will face him with Sarfraz Ahmed at the other end. A bit of a delay because of the advertisement which hasn't
Johnson to Shehzad, no run length delivery at 140kph angling away outside off, left alone by Shehzad
Johnson to Shehzad, 1 run back of length right on the stumps with some inswing, thick outside edge runs down to third man for one
Johnson to Sarfaraz, 1 run welcomes him with a bouncer towards the shoulders, Sarfraz takes his eyes off the ball and manages a glove towards short fine leg
Johnson to Shehzad, no run angles this across the batsman from just outside off by pitching on length, Shehzad pushed and missed
Johnson to Shehzad, no run fuller and wider outside off, left alone this time
Johnson to Shehzad, 1 wide swings this one down the leg side from length for a wide
Johnson to Shehzad, 2 runs short ball but it's not a bouncer, Shehzad stays back and pulls it over midwicket for two. He didn't middle that or it would have easily gone for four

Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run swings this in a long way from outside off, Sarfraz is stuck to the crease and is hit on the frint pad for a loud appeal, but the umpire says no. Might have hit just outside off

Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run run-out chance this time! The short of length ball jabbed in again, he pushed towards midwicket and wanted a single but Shehzad said no, had the fielder got a direct hit, he was gone
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, 1 wide way outside off from back of length, left for a wide
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, 1 leg bye full on the pads, flicked down to fine leg for one but it's off the pad
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run short of length outside off without any swing, pushed to point
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, 1 wide fuller and wider, easily left for another wide
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run brings it in now from back of length outside off, Shehzad defends it back
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, 1 run touch fuller outside off on length, thick edge goes to third man for one
Johnson to Shehzad, no run length ball outside off, driven firmly straight to cover
Johnson to Shafiq, 1 leg bye short ball on the pads, runs it down to fine leg off the thigh pad

Johnson to Sarfaraz, 4 byes short delivery, oh that's too short and that's gone over the keeper! It attained height after crossing the batsman after pitching outside off, and went for four byes. The umpire initially thought it went off the bat and had to change his decision
Johnson to Sarfaraz, no run teasing line outside off with the angle, he drives and misses
Johnson to Sarfaraz, no run fuller on the pads, tucked to square leg
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, 1 run short ball outside off, extra bounce takes the top of the bat to go to third man
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run jabs it in from short of length outside off, Sarfraz adjusts in time to cut it to second slip after a bounce
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run not as much movement this time, it was well outside off and maybe he expected it to come in so ended up chasing it and missed
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run fuller delivery outside off, pushed to cover point softly
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run keeps it full, it's driven handsomely towards the covers and Bailey dives to his right from cover point to stop it with one hand

Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs back to short of length, he stays back and plays it late, but dangerously, as it was very close to a diving Smith at second slip. Went just wide and beat third man too for a four
Johnson to Shafiq, 2 runs nearly a yorker on middle stump, driven off the back foot wide of mid-on for two
Johnson to Shafiq, no run good-length ball just outside off, defends it to point
Johnson to Shafiq, no run hint of inswing after it pitched on length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Johnson to Shafiq, no run length ball angling away this time outside off, pushed to cover point off the back foot
Johnson to Shafiq, no run bangs in a bouncer around middle stump, he ducks under it
Johnson to Shafiq, no run in the block hole outside off, inside edge hits the pads and that's only two from the over
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run swings it in from outside off, Sarfraz defends off the front foot towards cover
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, 2 runs comes down the track and across, pull-whips it to the fine-leg area for two as Faulkner cuts it in time
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run slightly full on the off stump, he pushes it back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run charges down again, Kane bangs it in and he's hit on the helmet while pulling and the ball goes to point
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, 2 runs length ball with room, runs it late just wide of third man for two more
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run brings it in a bit from length outside off, pushed to point without much footwork
Faulkner to Shafiq, 1 run full on the pads, tucked easily to deep midwicket for one
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, no run angled across this time off length, Sarfraz chased and missed
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, no run slightly shorter around off with the angle, pushed to cover this time. No time for a run
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, no run back of length outside off, he defends softly and the ball rolls away to the keeper

Faulkner to Sarfaraz, SIX runs charges down and what was that!! He just swept Faulkner for six and that's gone over the roof! The ball wasn't full but he came down and down on one knee, slog-swept the ball from jsut outside off for a massive six
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 wide slower one now but it's down leg for a wide
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run short of length and angling away, cuts it late to third man for one
Abbott to Sarfaraz, no run fullish delivery outside off, driven nicely to point
Abbott to Sarfaraz, no run bangs it in outside off, Sarfraz took a step down but that had some extra bounce to go over the bat
Abbott to Sarfaraz, no run back of length around off, he stays back this time and a thickish edge flies towards cover
Abbott to Sarfaraz, 1 run 141kph, on length just outside off, plays it late to run it to third man
Abbott to Shafiq, 1 run back of length ball on middle is clipped to fine leg off the back foot for one
Abbott to Sarfaraz, 1 run another short of length ball outside off, cuts it late to third man for one more
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs takes a step down and sweeps him again! Fine leg was in and he hit it well enough to sweep it along the ground, just wide of the fielder in the circle for four
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, no run the reply is a bouncer from Faulkner. He had to stay back for this one to defend it
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 2 runs bit of room and it's short of length outside off, he cuts it late, trying to beat third man for four but Abbot slides to his left to save two runs
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, no run right on target on middle stump on length, solid defence from Sarfraz
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs comes down the track and makes it a full toss on the pads to flick it past square leg for four more! He's turning the pressure back on Faulkner and Australia
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run back of length on leg stump, clipped softly towards midwicket for one and he keeps the strike
Abbott to Sarfaraz, 1 run moves across and he's just swept a back of length ball from outside off to fine leg. He's sweeping everything here
Abbott to Shafiq, 2 runs towards middle stump from back of length, clipped off the back foot to square leg in the gap
Abbott to Shafiq, no run slightly shorter outside off, tapped off the back foot to point
Abbott to Shafiq, no run bit of outswing from outside off, pushed down to mid-off off by staying in the crease
Abbott to Shafiq, no run on length this time on middle and off, flicked straight to square leg
Abbott to Shafiq, no run bit of inswing for the length ball outside off, driven to cover but not from the middle of the bat
Lyon to Sarfaraz, no run that is huge turn, massive turn, jags in and kicks from well outside off, he jabs it in the air, that would have been a dolly for short leg
Lyon to Sarfaraz, 1 run sharp turn once more, but flatter this time, and turned past square leg
Lyon to Shafiq, no run skips out, but Lyon spins it in a long way again, and he just taps it to midwicket
Lyon to Shafiq, 2 leg byes turn and bounce, and runs fine off the pads
Lyon to Shafiq, no run hits him on the pads, and has a shout, but that seems to be doing too much

Lyon to Shafiq, no run another lbw appeal, and Australia will review this, turning in from outside off, he shuffled across but missed it, struck above the roll, in front of middle, and ball tracker says that is turning enough to just miss leg
Abbott to Sarfaraz, 1 run chops a back of a length ball towards slip, scurries across, a direct hit at non-striker's would have been tight
Abbott to Shafiq, 1 run arches back a bit and glides it down to third man
Abbott to Sarfaraz, 1 run length ball turned to long leg
Abbott to Shafiq, 1 run too full down the pad and flicked to long leg
Abbott to Sarfaraz, 1 run runs this short of a length ball down to third man to bring up the 50 stand
Abbott to Shafiq, no run length ball driven back to the bowler

Lyon to Sarfaraz, OUT this is a strange dismissal, and Haddin has done so well to hang on to this, Sarfraz falls by the sweep, was through with the sweep a touch early as this offbreak spun in sharply from outside off, and it went straight to the keeper off the back of the bat, hit
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run angled in full, Alam gets bat down i time
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run tapped behind point, and there is confusion about the single, Shafiq gets back
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run angled in to the pad, nudged to short leg
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run lovely, tossed up, dipping, turning, pushed carefully past silly point
Johnson to Shafiq, no run lifter first ball from Johnson, Shafiq prods and is beaten
Johnson to Shafiq, no run more bounce, this time he tries to steer it past slip, beaten again
Johnson to Shafiq, no run back of a length ball worked to square leg
Johnson to Shafiq, FOUR runs fine response from Shafiq, flashes a pull as this one does not rise too much, Lyon runs a long way from deep square, but he has touched the rope as he slides
Johnson to Shafiq, no run this got up of course, Johnson digs in a bouncer, and even Haddin has to jump

Johnson to Shafiq, OUT the short ball barrage after spin has worked, there is a clear sound as Shafiq shuffles and tries to play this bouncer down the leg side, and Haddin goes up immediately, was too quick for Shafiq, brushed the glove on the way to keeper
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run all happening, flight and turn outside off, beats Alam on the forward push
Lyon to Fawad Alam, 1 run
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run first ball Akmal dashes out, and turns it with the spin to midwicket
Lyon to Fawad Alam, 1 run lunges forward and pushes a tossed up ball to point for a quick single
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run reaches for a wide tossed up ball and is not in great balance as he pushes it through point
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run what a ripper, angled in from round the stumps, pitches leg, jags past off stump, and opens up Alam in the process, too good
Johnson to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs Akmal will play his shots, this is full and wide, he reaches out and flays it between cover and point
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run length ball driven on the up to cover
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run slow and wide, he lets it go
Johnson to Umar Akmal, 1 run flashes at a short of a length ball and it flies in the air to third man
Johnson to Fawad Alam, no run Alam jumps across from an open stance and awkwardly lets this length ball go outside off
Johnson to Fawad Alam, no run he is standing outside leg stump with feet wide apart, then comes across and lets it be
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run worked with the turn to deep backward square
Lyon to Fawad Alam, 1 run lots of turn and he slaps it to the sweeper
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run Akmal survives, he wanted to turn this big offbreak to leg but it found a leading edge, went way over Maxwell at midwicket
Lyon to Fawad Alam, 1 run quicker one fired in full, he jabs it past short leg
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run Akmal lunges forward to this, but gets an inside edge to pad
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run flighted and full, eased to long on
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run starts with a line down the leg side from round the stumps with no close-in man and is turned square
Maxwell to Fawad Alam, no run is angled in and pops up, shouts of catch, Smith dives for it from slip but cannot hold on
Maxwell to Fawad Alam, 1 run wide and full driven to the sweeper
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run beaten as this goes across him from round the stumps
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run tossed up full, he is forward to nudge it
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run on leg stump, turned to square leg, not getting the single
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run angled in quick and full, he gets bat in front of pad to defend
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run jabs a straightening ball to extra cover
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run nice flight, he pushes it awkwardly to point
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run goes back as he sees this on a length but there is a lot of bounce and turn and he just taps it to point
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run this did not turn, there is an appeal for lbw, but it struck him outside the line
Lyon to Fawad Alam, no run bends well forward to smother this
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run leans forward and pushes for a single to long on
Maxwell to Fawad Alam, 1 run full ball driven to wide long off
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run right on middle from a length, he is forward to defend
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run down the leg side and turned in front of square
Maxwell to Fawad Alam, no run makes him push a flighted ball in the air, but short of extra cover
Maxwell to Fawad Alam, no run bat in front of pad and pushing forward to defend
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run big appeal as Akmal misses on the forward push, turned down, turning too much
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run stays back and pushes against the sharp turn to point
Lyon to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs flatter one and he cuts against the spin to the third man rope
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run goes back to work it behind square
Lyon to Fawad Alam, 1 run length ball straightening, forced to midwicket
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run skips down the track, is not to the pitch, but adjusts to clip it behind square
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run this did not turn, went across, and beat him on the cut
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run goes back to defend an offbreak on the off stump line
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, pushed to long on
Maxwell to Afridi, 2 runs appeal for lbw turned down first ball as Afridi paddles this full delivery
Maxwell to Afridi, no run on the front foot to push to mid off
Kane Richardson to Umar Akmal, no run he slams a cut straight to point, Maxwell lets rip from there and hits the non-striker's stumps, but Afridi is already back in
Kane Richardson to Umar Akmal, 1 run walks out and turns this short of a length ball to fine leg, Akmal looks for a second, Afridi does not
Kane Richardson to Afridi, no run right behind this length ball on off to block solidly
Kane Richardson to Afridi, 2 runs scythes this length ball through the covers, but sweeper denies the four with a dive in the deep
Kane Richardson to Afridi, 1 run he's swatted this off the pads in the air, on a couple of bounces to long leg
Kane Richardson to Umar Akmal, 1 leg bye walks out again, and the ball rolls fine off the pad
Abbott to Umar Akmal, no run drives a full ball to the bowler
Abbott to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs short and wide, Akmal leans back and slams it through point, that has rocketed into the rope
Abbott to Umar Akmal, 1 run short-arm pull now to deep midwicket, Afridi satisfied with one again
Abbott to Afridi, no run an Afridi heave and a miss to a short of a length ball outside off
Abbott to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs Akmal has punched another one past point, on his toes to ride the bounce and timing it past the man in the ring
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run back of a length, pushed to point
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run back of a length again, pushed to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run pushed to point off the back foot
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run shorter ball, gets big on him, he fends it down awkwardly into the pitch

Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, 1 run opens the face and steers it to third man
Abbott to Anwar Ali, 1 run length ball into the pad turned to deep midwicket
Abbott to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs Akmal goes down the ground, takes a step out, and sends it high with a straight followthrough, stays in the air for a long time and falls just inside the rope
Abbott to Umar Akmal, no run slower length ball tapped to midwicket
Abbott to Umar Akmal, no run short of a length, outside off, defended to the bowler
Abbott to Umar Akmal, no run neatly pushed but straight to extra cover
Abbott to Umar Akmal, no run length ball on off stump, tapped to extra cover
Lyon to Anwar Ali, no run big turn, and bounce, Anwar carefully plays it out

Lyon to Anwar Ali, 1 run fuller and on the stumps, nudged past leg slip
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run sharp turn and bounce again, defended onto the crease
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run waits for this flighted ball to turn and cuts to short third
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run quicker and flatter on middle, worked to deep midwicket
Johnson to Umar Akmal, 1 run slow and wide one, he reaches for it and guides it to the sweeper
Johnson to Anwar Ali, no run short of a length, climbing into him, he hops and works it to midwicket
Johnson to Anwar Ali, no run bouncer, he tries to ride it, but it gets too big, and he lets it be
Johnson to Anwar Ali, 1 wide too much angle sends this short of a length ball down leg
Johnson to Anwar Ali, FOUR runs pitched up outside off, he flashes it in the air past point for four
Johnson to Anwar Ali, no run length ball on leg stump, pushed away
Johnson to Anwar Ali, no run back of a length, he hops and taps it in front of cover, wants the single, Akmal is not interested, Anwar stops and raises his hands questioningly towards his partner
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run almost played on, he was going back as this spun in and bounced, he tapped it into the crease and it went on the bounce, past the stumps to the keeper
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run leans forward to force it with the spin down the track, is in the air and Lyon dives, but it eludes him
Lyon to Anwar Ali, no run comes across and pushes it off the back foot
Lyon to Anwar Ali, no run goes stretching outside off to defend onto pad
Lyon to Anwar Ali, 1 run fuller ball, he turns it past the non-striker for a single
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run tossed up outside off, he leans forward and whips it to long on
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run back of a length, he tries to glide it to third man but misses
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run pitched up outside off, pushed to covers
Johnson to Umar Akmal, 1 run length ball cracked along the ground to the sweeper
Johnson to Anwar Ali, no run sharp llifter, he keeps bat down and lets it pass
Johnson to Anwar Ali, no run bouncer, slanted across, he watches it go
Johnson to Anwar Ali, 1 wide pushes it too far wide outside off, he looks to go after it, but resists
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run tossed up ball nudged to square leg
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run squirts an attempted drive off a thick edge to backward point
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run worked with the spin to deep midwicket
Lyon to Wahab Riaz, no run lunges forward to this length offbreak from round the stumps
Lyon to Wahab Riaz, no run in the air for a while and rolls away through vacant short leg as he presses forward
Lyon to Wahab Riaz, no run angles it across, Riaz forward to push to extra cover
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run turned to midwicket
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run whipped off the pad to square leg
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run makes room and cuts to short third man from very close to off, Finch misfields
Maxwell to Wahab Riaz, no run forward to push it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Wahab Riaz, no run full ball turned off the pad to square leg
Maxwell to Wahab Riaz, no run overpitched, driven back to the bowler
Lyon to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs that is in the gap past deep midwicket, takes a tossed up ball from off and lofts it with the spin
Lyon to Umar Akmal, 1 run backs away but this spins in sharply, he works it in front of square
Lyon to Wahab Riaz, FOUR runs Riaz now, sweeps this full ball hard from around off and picks up four to deep square leg
Lyon to Wahab Riaz, no run tries the sweep again, misses, and it bounces to hit the helmet grille
Lyon to Wahab Riaz, 1 run leans forward and works it past short leg
Lyon to Umar Akmal, no run waits for it to turn and cuts, to short third man
Maxwell to Babar, no run pushes past the non-striker and trots out for a single, mid off is around
Maxwell to Babar, no run beaten on the cut now off this length ball
Maxwell to Babar, no run just gets the bat down in time as this length ball straightens on the stumps
Maxwell to Babar, no run leans forward to defend to the off side
Maxwell to Babar, no run plays a tossed up ball off the back foot and defends
Kane Richardson to Irfan, no run that just missed off stump, as Irfan pushed inside the line of a length ball
Kane Richardson to Irfan, no run tries to fend this bouncer away, is hit on the chest
Kane Richardson to Irfan, no run pushes a length ball to point
Kane Richardson to Irfan, no run full ball outside off pushed to extra cover
Kane Richardson to Irfan, no run backs away and forces a full ball to the bowler
Maxwell to Babar, SIX runs clobbered down the ground, takes a couple of steps to this one on off and lofts it cleanly
Maxwell to Babar, no run reverse swept off middle and leg to backward point now
Maxwell to Babar, no run pushed off the front foot to mid off
Maxwell to Babar, 1 run down the track again and inside edges a heave to long leg
Maxwell to Irfan, 1 wide spins in down the leg side
Maxwell to Irfan, SIX runs that is a massive blow, that is over deep midwicket and out of the ground as Irfan bends forward and slogs

Maxwell to Irfan, SIX runs almost got him, almost, Irfan had another swat and sent it soaring to long on, Lyon takes it over his head, throws it up as he goes over the boundary, jumps back in, and leans to grasp it again, but it pops out and falls over the boundary
Kane Richardson to Babar, FOUR runs crashed through extra cover as Babar lofts it sweetly in the gap
Kane Richardson to Babar, 1 run makes room outside leg and heaves at this bouncer, which just clears Warner at mid off

What a thorough win for the Australians. It was supposed to be a trial by spin for them but so far it is Pakistan who are getting spun out. Lyon was outstanding on a turner, Maxwell chipping in as well and the pace of Johnson nipping out three too
That is all we have from this match. Good night
Australia won by 93 runs
Player of the match is Steven Smith, AUS
